title: Macbook 2011 image problem
message:
Turn on with black imagen. 2 seconds later restart and turn on and try to load OS X. Screen is as picture red. Never goes to desktop. 10 seconds later stays at white screen and reboot.

[I] replaced 9000 with new one 16+ chip. All the same. Any idea what to do next?[/I]

title: Macbook 2011 image problem
message: Bad GPU/VRAM/soldering. 2016 09000 chips are usually fake.

title: Macbook 2011 image problem
message: What DC recommend me for 9000 chip?

title: Macbook 2011 image problem
message: I have 1340 right now. But the fake chips should still produce a good image, they will just die in a few monts again.
